name: Vineyard (rikoo)
description:
This game is the result of a Technically A Challenge wih the theme Vine/Ivy.

It has been produced in two weeks on my free time, I did everything except the sound (you may check the credits to know the artists).

Game description:

In this chill little game, you will be able to grow some magical vine in the sand to turn green this overused land. There is no goal, just chilling and trying some cool procedural stuff.

Controls:

  • Left Click: Planting vines
  • Arrow Left and Right: Rotating camera
  • R: Restarting the level

Credits:

  • Erik Kubiak: everything except sounds
  • Migfus 20: main theme
  • poodaddy69: error sound
  • menegass: seed planting
